title: Kate Middleton's brother James 'engaged to French girlfriend Alizee Thevenet'
text:
Get the biggest Royal Family stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Kate Middleton's brother James is engaged to his French girlfriend Alizee Thevenet, according to reports.

Entrepreneur James, 32, is believed to have met the 29-year-old City worker last year during a chance encounter at the South Kensington Club in west London.

The pair moved in together earlier this year and it appears that James has already popped the question.

"They’ve got engaged," a source told the Daily Mail. "Alizee has been wearing a beautiful sapphire sparkler.

"They’ve been keeping the engagement secret, but news has started to leak out among their friends. They’ll be announcing it formally next week."

The couple were spotted kissing during a Middleton family getaway to the Caribbean island of St Barts in January.

(Image: UK Press via Getty Images)

(Image: Getty Images)

James split up with former MTV host and socialite Donna Air at the beginning of 2018 after a five-year romance.

Miss Thevenet moved to Britain six years ago and has a master's degree in investment and finance from Queen Mary University of London.

Earlier this year, James revealed how he had struggled with mental illness in a powerfully honest account and said a weight has been lifted by doing so.

(Image: AbacaPress / SplashNews.com)

The 31-year-old said he had two motivations for speaking out about what he refers to as a "cancer of the mind".

Despite saying he is not 'cured' of his clinical depression that began in 2016, he now has an understanding of his illness and feels a renewed purpose in life.
description: The pair, who met in a west London social club last year, will reportedly make an official announcement next week
